item.name: Apache Workers - Idle cleanup of worker
Apache - CPU Load (1 min average per core)
Apache - CPU Load (5 min average per core)
Apache - CPU Load (15 min average per core)
Apache Workers - Open slot with no current process

trigger.expression: {Template Apache HTTPD Status:httpd[BusyWorkers, {$STATUS_URL}].last()}>{Template Apache HTTPD Status:httpd[TotalWorkers, {$STATUS_URL}].last()}*0.90
trigger.name: [{HOST.NAME}] More than 90% worker are busy

trigger.expression: {Template Apache HTTPD Status:httpd[BusyWorkers, {$STATUS_URL}].last()}>{Template Apache HTTPD Status:httpd[TotalWorkers, {$STATUS_URL}].last()}*0.95
trigger.name: [{HOST.NAME}] More than 95% worker are busy
